title: Treatment for chronic diarrhoea and abdominal pain might be found in milk
description: Milk is found to contain nano particles that could well be the new and unlikely gut-protecting ally for those with leaky gut syndrome, say National University of Singapore researchers. And they may be even better than probiotics.

title: Rust filming to restart 18 months after Alec Baldwin shooting
description: Filming will restart with the same principal actors and the same director, Joel Souza, who was wounded in the 2021 shooting.
